dcterms:description: Conducted by the National Bureau of Statistics of Benin, this census provides data at both the household and individual levels.
dcterms:title: 2013 Population and Habitation Census data of Benin

dcterms:description: Used to estimate parameters of the Beta distribution for ability-based preferences.
dcterms:title: Data on average GPA in junior high school for a sample of students in Benin in 2018

dcterms:creator: G. Becker
N. Tomes
dcterms:description: This study discusses child endowments and the quantity and quality of children.
dcterms:title: Child endowments and the quantity and quality of children

dcterms:creator: R. Dizon-Ross
dcterms:description: This study examines parents’ beliefs about their children’s academic ability and its implications for educational investments.
dcterms:title: Parents’ beliefs about their children’s academic ability: Implications for educational investments

dcterms:creator: M. Giannola
dcterms:description: This study provides evidence on parental investments and intra-household inequality in child human capital.
dcterms:title: Parental investments and intra-household inequality in child human capital: evidence from a survey experiment
